titleStmt.title: An account of the life and death of the Blessed Virgin according to Romish writers with the grounds of the worship paid to her, and a preface in answer to the Apology for the Contemplations, &c. / by a lay hand.
titleStmt.author: Fleetwood, William, 1656-1723.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Clark, for Thomas Newborough ...,

notesStmt.note: "The following piece is none of my own, but a learned and renowned Frenchman's, which I have drest up in English, with some little alteration of the style, and addition of some little matters"--Pref.
The preface "To J.C.D.D." [i.e. John Cross] is a reply to that author's "Apology for the Contemplations on the life and glory of the holy mother of Jesus."
Attributed to William Fleetwood. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
